currency

Class CurrencyHelper<Type extends java.lang.Number & java.lang.Comparable<Type>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • currency.CurrencyHelper<Type>
  • Type Parameters:
    Type - they type of number that is used to store the currency value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CurrencyHelper<Type>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Currency

    public abstract class CurrencyHelper<Type extends java.lang.Number & java.lang.Comparable<Type>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CurrencyHelper<Type>>
    An abstract class that is used when creating other types of currency. The separation of the helper class was needed because of an issue I was having when working in a single class.
    Author:
    Joshua Zierman [py1422xs@metrostate.edu]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
